name: Redemptio De Inferno
description:
Two friends. 9 circles of Dante's Inferno. One must betray the other.

Every round is one circle of Hell. To win a round you have to kill the other player with falling objects. Each round has a special object that fits the theme of  that circle. The player with most rounds won is the final winner.

Player1 Controls: WAD to move, S to summon a falling object.

Player2 Controls: Left, Right and Up Arrow Keys to move, Down Arrow Key to summon a falling object.

Team project, made for a 48-hour Nordeus M3 game jam. May, 2022.

IMPORTANT: The game's resolution is broken on smaller screens. If that is the case for you, play this game on the following LINK.
